early: The year has started moving. It will not slow down.
This still feels manageable. That will pass.
Plenty of time remains. This belief is temporary.
The calendar is optimistic at the beginning.
This is the calm part people misremember later.
The year is young. That advantage is already shrinking.
Momentum has begun forming without your input.
You are still allowed to believe this can be shaped.
mid: You are past the point where plans feel flexible.
This year is no longer forgiving.
You are improvising more than you admit.
Most intentions have entered maintenance mode.
The margin for correction is thinner now.
This no longer feels like the beginning.
You are spending more time reacting than choosing.
The year is settling into memory.
late: Most of this year already exists only as memory.
There is not enough time left to do this carefully.
You are negotiating with the calendar now.
The ending is visible from here.
The remaining days are not generous.
Soon this becomes historical rather than current.
The year has stopped pretending to be open-ended.
Time is collecting what it is owed.
This phase does not last long.
final: This year is finished. Nothing else fits here.
The year has closed. No amendments allowed.
Everything unfinished belongs to the past now.
This year will not change again.
This timeline is no longer editable.
The year has ended without commentary.

normal: This will not improve your plans.
Nature is not responding to feedback.
The sky has selected a state.
error: No forecast. The day will happen anyway.
The sky did not return our call.

feels_like: This is how it feels. Accuracy is irrelevant.
Your body disagrees with the number.
daylight: This is all the daylight you get.
daylight_error: Daylight data missing. Night remains inevitable.
No daylight figures available. Sunset still guaranteed.
